Class JtsTransformer

extends java.lang.Object

      • toJTSGeometryCollection

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryCollection toJTSGeometryCollection​(@NotNull
                                                                              @NotNull java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry> gList,
                                                                              boolean forceGeometryCollection)
        Creates a JTS GeometryCollection from the list of JTS geometry objects. If the geometries are homogeneous, ie only points, line strings, or polygons, create the specific geometric aggregate
        Parameters:
        gList - list of JTS geometries
        forceGeometryCollection - true, if the result shall be a com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryCollection no matter what, else false
        Returns:
        a JTS GeometryCollection (empty if the given list is null or empty)

      • toJTSGeometry

        @NotNull
public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry toJTSGeometry​(@NotNull
                                                          @NotNull org.deegree.geometry.Geometry geom)
                                                   throws UnsupportedGeometryTypeException
        Computes a JTS geometry from the given deegree geometry. Supported geometry types:
        • GM_Point
        • Curve types:
          • GM_Curve
          • GM_Ring
          • GM_LinearRing
          • GM_LineString
          • GM_OrientedCurve (orientation is ignored when computing the JTS geometry)
        • Curve segment types (linearization will often be used):
          • GM_Arc (will be linearized)
          • GM_Circle (will be linearized)
          • GM_LineString
          • GM_CubicSpline (will be linearized)
          • GM_ArcString (will be linearized)
          • GM_GeodesicString (apparently no linearization - with code from deegree 3.4-pre22-SNAPSHOT)
        • Surface types:
          • GM_Surface
          • GM_PolyhedralSurface
          • GM_OrientableSurface (orientation is ignored when computing the JTS geometry)
        • Surface patch types (also if a surface has more than one patch):
          • GM_Polygon
        • Composite types:
          • GM_Composite (implemented as deegree CompositeGeometry)
          • GM_CompositePoint
          • GM_CompositeCurve
          • GM_CompositeSurface
        • Multi geometry types:
          • GM_Aggregate (implemented as deegree MultiGeometry)
          • GM_MultiPoint
          • GM_MultiCurve
          • GM_MultiSurface

        Geometry types that are NOT supported:

        • GM_Solid
        • Curve segment types:
          • GM_ArcByBulge
          • ArcByCenterPoint
          • GM_ArcStringByBulge
          • GM_Bezier
          • GM_BSplineCurve
          • CircleByCenterPoint
          • GM_Clothoid
          • GM_Geodesic
          • GM_OffsetCurve
          • GM_Conic
        • Surface types:
          • GM_TriangulatedSurface
          • GM_Tin
          • GM_ParametricCurveSurface
          • GM_GriddedSurface
          • GM_BilinearGrid
          • GM_BicubicGrid
          • GM_Cone
          • GM_Cylinder
          • GM_Sphere
          • GM_BSplineSurface
        • Composite types:
          • GM_CompositeSolid
        • Multi geometry types:
          • GM_MultiSolid
        Parameters:
        geom - the deegree geometry
        Returns:
        the resulting JTS geometry
        Throws:
        UnsupportedGeometryTypeException - if transformation to a JTS geometry is not supported for this type of deegree geometry

      • toJTSGeometry

        @NotNull
public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry toJTSGeometry​(@NotNull
                                                          @NotNull org.basex.query.value.node.ANode node)
                                                   throws org.basex.query.QueryException
        Computes a JTS geometry from the given node (which must represent a GML geometry).

        See {toJTSGeometry(Geometry) for a list of supported and unsupported geometry types.

        Parameters:
        node - the geometry element
        Returns:
        the resulting JTS geometry
        Throws:
        org.basex.query.QueryException - if an exception occurred

      • emptyJTSGeometry

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry emptyJTSGeometry()

      • toFlattenedJTSGeometryCollection

        public static java.util.Collection<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry> toFlattenedJTSGeometryCollection​(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry geom)
        Adds a geometry to a collection. If the geometry is a GeometryCollection (but not a MultiPoint, -LineString, or -Polygon) its members are added (recursively scanning for GeometryCollections). Spatial relationship operators cannot be performed for a JTS GeometryCollection, but for (Multi)Point, (Multi)LineString, and (Multi)Polygon.
        Parameters:
        geom - the geometry
        Returns:
        the list of JTS geometries (without GeometryCollection objects)
